p: Paper-based or electronic clinical and health outcome questionnaires will be sent to participants at 2, 6, 9 and 12 months to complete primary and secondary outcomes at home. Structural outcome measures recorded using MRI of the knee joint will be conducted at baseline and 12 months at radiology practices in Melbourne and Sydney. Ethical approval has been obtained from the University of Melbourne Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC No. 1647671) and the Northern Sydney Local Health Districts Human Research Ethics Committee (HREC/16/HAWKE/430). All participants will provide written informed consent.
